title: Summoners Society (league of legends group) Looking for a Team Leader for our Community Content Team

embed.description: We are looking for someone who is creative and experienced to help guide our Community Content team to Success.

body:
Hello Summoners, *Position available*

We are looking for a Team Leader for our Community Content Team.

This is a great opportunity for someone who wants to gain experience for running their content team one day.

This role will require a bit more experience, as we are looking for someone who has the skills currently. If you believe you have what it takes to grow content creators and making an awesome team, please apply below
